actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit individuals to deduct losses, resulting from drought, to family gardens and to residential property of the taxpayer.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals an income tax deduction of up to $100 in drought losses of grass, trees, shrubs, flowers, and vegetables on their residential property and family gardens.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit individuals to deduct losses, resulting from drought, to family gardens and to residential property of the taxpayer.
